;Background of The Omega Replica Watches
;
;The forerunner of Omega replica watches was founded at La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland in 1848 by 23-year-outdated Louis Brant, who assembled important-wound precision pocket watches from areas provided by nearby craftsmen. He sold his watches from Italy to Scandinavia by way of England, his chief marketplace. After Louis Brandt's death in 1879, his two sons Louis-Paul and César, troubled by irregular deliveries of questionable top quality, abandoned the unsatisfactory assembly workshop system in favour of in-home manufacturing and whole manufacturing control. Due to the larger provide of manpower, communications and vitality in Biel, the enterprise moved into a modest factory in January 1880, then bought the complete constructing in December. Two a long time afterwards the business moved into a converted spinning-factory in the Gurzelen district of Biel, wherever headquarters are even now situated right now. Their 1st series-made calibres, Labrador and Gurzelen, as properly as the renowned Omega calibre of 1894, would make certain the brand's marketing and advertising results.
;
;Louis-Paul and César Brandt both died in 1903, leaving 1 of Switzerland's biggest watch businesses — with 240,000 watches created each year and using 800 folks — in the palms of four youthful people, the oldest of whom, Paul-Emile Brandt, was not nevertheless 24. Brandt was the excellent architect and builder of Omega. His impact would be felt over the following 50 percent-century. The financial troubles introduced on by the 1st Globe War would lead him to function actively from 1925 towards the union of Omega and Tissot, then to their merger in 1930 in the group SSIH, Geneva. Under his leadership, and from 1955 that of Joseph Reiser, the SSIH Group ongoing to grow and multiply, absorbing or developing some fifty companies.
